text: "Tipsy" is the first single off of American rapper J-Kwon's debut studio album Hood Hop. The song was released on April 6, 2004. The song was able to make it to #2 on the Billboard Hot 100. it is J-Kwon's most well known song. A music video for the song was released. It opens with a shot of the Gateway Arch in St. Louis, Missouri. The rest of the video features J-Kwon hosting a house party with everyone partying. It ends with a reference to the 1983 movie Risky Business and J-Kwon getting caught by his parents the day after. ==References== ==Other websites== *"Tipsy" on YouTube Category:2003 songs Category:Hip hop songs
title: Tipsy
